===FCC info=== <!--{{FCC ST|10/16/2014}}--> *CPU: [[MediaTek MT7620A]] @580MHz (TFBGA265) *Flash: [http://www.winbond.com/hq/enu/ProductAndSales/ProductLines/FlashMemory/SerialFlash/W25Q256FV.htm Winbond W25Q256FVFG] 32MB (SPI SOIC-16) *RAM: [http://www.winbond.com/hq/enu/ProductAndSales/ProductLines/SpecialtyDRAM/DDR2SDRAM/W971GG6KB.htm Winbond W971GG6KB-25l] 128MB (DDR2 SDRAM)
